projects.heading: SELF-SERVICE AI PLATFORM
projects.description: Put Machine Learning & Data Science into the hands of business users gives marketing teams agile, flexible tools to experiment with combinations and improve their targeting without having to burden over-worked data science resources.

statements.heading: Product Development Period
statements.heading_details: Began during the COVID-19 pandemic when global uncertainty was high.

statements.heading: Budget
statements.heading_details: Significant budget allocated to create a future-ready self-service AI platform.

details.value: - 3 Data Scientists
- 1 Statistician
- 1 Architect
- 1 Me (UX Designer)
- Completed multiple courses on data science to understand AI tools like Alteryx, IBM Watson, and Data Robot etc.
- Collaborated with stakeholders to ask critical questions and brainstorm ideas.
- The concept was abstract, leading to multiple assumptions which were documented and verified with Subject Matter Experts (SMEs).
- Created at least 35 different UI design and interaction patterns before finalizing the concept.
- Uncovered multiple previously unknown requirements from stakeholders during these discussions.
- Aligned all stakeholders on a single vision, ensuring satisfaction across the board.
- Successfully harmonized diverse stakeholder needs to create a cohesive platform.
- Recognized with a “Special Initiative Award” for developing this application.

additionalsegment.header: I have created the following use case to better understand this platform.
